page.title: 18HEATON CHAPEL-CHILD'S VIEW
page.content: "My{favourite shop}is Forbuoys because they sell{sweets, books and toys.}I go with my Nana at weekends." Alan (aged 9) "My mum and dad like{gardening.}I help them. My mum grows{flowers,}my dad grows{vegetables,}and I am growing a {sunflower." Danielle (aged 9) "We{play}along Blackbrook stream. One evening we{found}two carrier bags. We looked inside and found{Â£11,435!}It had been{stolen.}Everyone thanked us." Martin (aged 9) "My{cubs}meet every Tuesday evening in a big hut. We are the{21st Stockport {Cub and Scout Pack.}We are given points for being{neat and tidy.}The evening closes when we{salute the {flag.}We go on lots of outings, especially{camping." Richard (aged 9)
